recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.
steps: Boil pasta until al dente.
Cook pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan.
Mix hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper.
recipes.author: Chef Abc

recipes.title: Chocolate Mug Cake
recipes.description: A quick and easy chocolate cake made in a mug using a microwave.
steps: Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder in a mug.
Add milk, oil, and vanilla extract; stir until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips if using.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds or until cooked through.
Let it cool for a minute and enjoy.
recipes.author: Admin

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy and soft pancakes perfect for breakfast with syrup and butter.
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour batter.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup and butter.
